import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ImportsModule } from './imports'; import { Step1FormComponent } from './steps/step-1-form.component'; @Component({ selector: 'stepper-vertical-demo', templateUrl: './stepper-vertical-demo.html', standalone: true, imports: [ImportsModule, Step1FormComponent], }) export class StepperVerticalDemo { stepValidities: boolean[] = [false, false, false]; onStepValid(index: number, isValid: boolean) { this.stepValidities[index] = isValid; } }
